descriptions.aiCoach: Get personalized recommendations powered by advanced AI that learns from your unique biology, lifestyle patterns, and health goals to optimize your longevity journey.
descriptions.genetic: Comprehensive analysis of 700,000+ genetic variants to understand your predispositions, optimize interventions, and create truly personalized health strategies.
descriptions.biomarker: Track 50+ critical biomarkers in real-time to monitor your health status, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions for optimal wellness.
descriptions.diseaseRisk: Advanced risk assessment for 150+ conditions using genetic data and lifestyle factors, with actionable prevention strategies tailored to your profile.
descriptions.workouts: Science-backed exercise protocols customized to your genetic profile, fitness level, and longevity goals for maximum health impact and sustainable results.
descriptions.nutrition: Precision nutrition plans based on your metabolic type, genetic variants, food sensitivities, and real-time biomarker data for optimal health outcomes.
descriptions.biohacking: Evidence-based biohacking protocols including sleep optimization, stress management, and recovery techniques tailored to your unique biology.
descriptions.tracking: Comprehensive progress monitoring with detailed analytics, trend analysis, and insights to keep you on track toward your longevity goals.
descriptions.integration: Seamlessly connect 100+ devices and lab tests including wearables, genetic tests, and health monitors for complete health data integration.
descriptions.support: Access to longevity experts, nutritionists, and health coaches available 24/7 to guide you through your optimization journey and answer questions.
